member.name: M:Kucoin.Net.Interfaces.IKucoinSocketClientSpot.SubscribeToMatchEngineUpdatesAsync(System.String,System.Action{CryptoExchange.Net.Sockets.DataEvent{Kucoin.Net.Objects.Spot.Socket.KucoinStreamMatchEngineUpdate}})

summary.para: Subscribe to match engine updates. There are different update types with classes derived from
: A valid order is received by the matching engine
: A limit order is opened on the order book
: An order is no longer on the order book
: An order is matched with another order
: An order is changed (decreased) in size

summary.para: Subscribe to match engine updates. There are different update types with classes derived from
: A valid order is received by the matching engine
: A limit order is opened on the order book
: An order is no longer on the order book
: An order is matched with another order
: An order is changed (decreased) in size

A key to identify the credentials for the API. For example, when set to `kucoinPass` the json data should contain a value for the property `kucoinPass`. Defaults to 'apiPassPhrase'.

summary.para: Subscribe to match engine updates. There are different update types with classes derived from
: A valid order is received by the matching engine
: A limit order is opened on the order book
: An order is no longer on the order book
: An order is matched with another order
: An order is changed (decreased) in size
